## Properties

| Property       | Attribute       | Description                                                   | Type     | Default |
| -------------- | --------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ------- |
| `baseFraction` | `base-fraction` | The number of portions that the flex container is split into. | `number` | `12`    |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name            | Description                |
| --------------- | -------------------------- |
| `--lg`          | The default value is 992.  |
| `--md`          | The default value is 768.  |
| `--sm`          | The default value is 576.  |
| `--wrapped-lg`  | The default value is 960.  |
| `--wrapped-md`  | The default value is 720.  |
| `--wrapped-sm`  | The default value is 540.  |
| `--wrapped-xl`  | The default value is 1140. |
| `--wrapped-xs`  | The default value is 0.    |
| `--wrapped-xxl` | The default value is 1320. |
| `--xl`          | The default value is 1200. |
| `--xs`          | The default value is 0.    |
| `--xxl`         | The default value is 1400. |
